text: Sofi Ahmed Chowdhury is a retired two-star rank Bangladesh Army officer and former Director General of Bangladesh Rifles. ==Career== Chowdhury was the General Officer Commanding of the 33 Infantry division of Bangladesh Army. He was the Martial Law Administrator of Comilla region. He served as the Director General of Bangladesh rifles from 1 July 1988 to 23 Sep 1990. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Bangladesh Army generals Category:Director Generals of Border Guards Bangladesh Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sofi Ahmed Chowdhury
